GXM.data.FeatureStore¶

Extends
  • Ext.data.Store
class GXM.data.FeatureStore(config)¶

The class that is used to construct a GXM FeatureStore.

Config Options¶

Configuration properties in addition to those listed for Ext.data.Store.

model

String The identifier for the model to be used. Defaults to gxm_layer.

proxy

String/Ext.data.Proxy/Object The proxy to be used by the store. Defaults to a configuration object for a Ext.data.MemoryProxy that has a Ext.data.reader.Json set as reader-property.
